blocks.name: nn0onn0ex
blocks.content: For each odd nonnegative integer there is a nonnegative integer which, multiplied by 2 and increased by 1, results in the odd nonnegative integer. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0onn0ex(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  syldan(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  nn0o(c0)
  rspcedvd(s0, cn0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wb(wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1))))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1), co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), caddc, nat1, co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0), wceq(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1)))
  eqtr2d(c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  oveq1d(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1, co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  divcan2d(nat2, co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  peano2cnm(c0)
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  nn0cn(c0)
  npcan1(c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, co(co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), caddc, nat1)
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nn0enn0ex
blocks.content: For each even nonnegative integer there is a nonnegative integer which, multiplied by 2, results in the even nonnegative integer. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0enn0ex(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, cn0, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wceq(co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  nn0cn(c0)
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  eqcomd(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  divcan2(c0, nat2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nnennex
blocks.content: For each even positive integer there is a positive integer which, multiplied by 2, results in the even positive integer. (Contributed by AV, 5-Jun-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnennex(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn)), wrex(s0, cn, wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  rspcedvd(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn)), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wb(wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0))), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))))
  eqeq2d(c0, co(nat2, cmul, cv(s0)), co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c0, cdiv, nat2), nat2, cmul)
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0))
  nncn(c0)
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  eqcomd(c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  divcan2(c0, nat2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cn)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, co(nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat2, cmul, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cdiv, nat2)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nneop
blocks.content: A positive integer is even or odd. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)

blocks.name: nneom
blocks.content: A positive integer is even or odd. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)

blocks.name: nn0eo
blocks.content: A nonnegative integer is even or odd. (Contributed by AV, 27-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0eo(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wo(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)))
} = {
  mpd(wcel(c0, cn0), wo(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)), wo(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cn0), wo(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(c0, cz))
  nn0z(c0)
  zeo(c0)
  orim12d(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  ex(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  syl22anc(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, cr), wbr(nat0, cle, c0), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  divge0(c0, nat2)
  elnn0z(co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
  ex(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0))
  sylanbrc(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
  syl22anc(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(nat2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  nn0red(co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn0))
  peano2nn0(c0)
  addge0d(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, cn0))
  nn0re(c0)
  1red(wcel(c0, cn0))
  nn0ge0(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(nat0, cle, nat1))
  0le1()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(nat2, cr))
  2re()
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(nat0, clt, nat2))
  2pos()
  divge0(co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat2)
  elnn0z(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.name: nnpw2even
blocks.content: 2 to the power of a positive integer is even. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm nnpw2even(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cdiv, nat2), cn))
} = {
  eqeltrrd(co(co(nat2, cexp, c0), cdiv, nat2), cn, co(nat2, cexp, co(c0, cmin, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  expm1d(nat2, c0, wcel(c0, cn))
  2cnd(wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wne(nat2, nat0))
  2ne0()
  nnz(c0)
  nnexpcld(nat2, co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(nat2, cn))
  2nn()
  nnm1nn0(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nnpw2even(class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ →((2[^]c0)[÷]2)∈ ℕ)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(((2[^]c0)[÷]2), cn, (2[^](c0[-]1)), c0 ∈ ℕ)
  expm1d(nat2, c0, c0 ∈ ℕ)
  2cnd(c0 ∈ ℕ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℕ, 2 ≠ 0)
  2ne0()
  nnz(c0)
  nnexpcld(nat2, (c0[-]1), c0 ∈ ℕ)
  a1i(c0 ∈ ℕ, 2 ∈ ℕ)
  2nn()
  nnm1nn0(c0)
}

blocks.name: zefldiv2
blocks.content: The floor of an even integer divided by 2 is equal to the integer divided by 2. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: zofldiv2
blocks.content: The floor of an odd integer divided by 2 is equal to the integer first decreased by 1 and then divided by 2. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm zofldiv2(class c0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cfv(cfl, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), cfv(cfl, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)))))
  fveq2d(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(c0, cz))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), wcel(c0, cz))
  oveq1d(c0, cdiv, nat2, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc))
  zcn(c0)
  eqcomd(c0, co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cc))
  npcan1(c0)
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cz), wceq(co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cc), wcel(nat1, cc), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  zcnd(co(c0, cmin, nat1), wcel(c0, cz))
  peano2zm(c0)
  1cnd(wcel(c0, cz))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cz), wa(wcel(nat2, cc), wne(nat2, nat0)))
  2cnne0()
  divdir(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat1, nat2)
  mpbiri(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat1)))
  pm3.2i(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat1))
  halfge0()
  halflt1()
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz)), wb(wceq(cfv(cfl, co(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))), co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2)), wa(wbr(nat0, cle, co(nat1, cdiv, nat2)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), clt, nat1))), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, nat2), cr))
  biimpa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz), wcel(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cz))
  zob(c0)
  halfre()
  flbi2(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), co(nat1, cdiv, nat2))
}

blocks.name: nn0ofldiv2
blocks.content: The floor of an odd nonnegative integer divided by 2 is equal to the integer first decreased by 1 and then divided by 2. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jun-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 7-Jun-2020.)

blocks.name: flnn0div2ge
blocks.content: The floor of a positive integer divided by 2 is greater than or equal to the integer decreased by 1 and then divided by 2. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jun-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm flnn0div2ge(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))), wo(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0)))
  nn0eo(c0)
  jaoi(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cn0), wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))))
  ex(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2))))
  breqtrrd(co(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cdiv, nat2), cle, cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(c0, cdiv, nat2), wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0)))
  lediv1dd(co(c0, cmin, nat1), nat2, c0, wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0)))
  adantl(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cr))
  adantl(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c0, cr))
  a1i(wa(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0)), wcel(nat2, crp))
  2rp()
  adantl(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wbr(co(c0, cmin, nat1), cle, c0))
  adantr(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)))
  syl(wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cn0), wceq(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), co(c0, cdiv, nat2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, nat2), cz))
  nn0z(co(c0, cdiv, nat2))
  flid(co(c0, cdiv, nat2))

blocks.name: flnn0ohalf
blocks.content: The floor of the half of an odd positive integer is equal to the floor of the half of the integer decreased by 1. (Contributed by AV, 5-Jun-2012.)
